item.title: Forgiving Sin
item.description: John 20:21-23 (KJV) 21 Then said Jesus to them again, Peace be unto you: as my Father hath sent me, even so send I you. 22 And when he had said this, he breathed on them, and saith unto them, Receive ye the Holy Ghost: 23 Whose soever sins ye remit, they are remitted unto them; and whose soever sins ye retain, they are retained.

item.title: News Sites
item.description: Sites I visit for news and information. I use Newsify for my RSS reader. Itâ€™s as close to the long dead Google Reader as you can get. News, Economics, OpEd Lew Rockwell ZeroHedge Mises Wire Shenandoah - John Galt FLA The Blaze Breitbart News Crypto News Cointelegraph The Daily HODL World News RT .

item.title: Obsidian
item.description: Around 2005 or 2006 I discovered org-mode for emacs . I was my sole reason for moving from Vim to emacs. For the last approximately 19 years I have used emacs as my daily driver for note taking.

item.title: Repeal The House Permanent Apportionment Act of 1929
Water Baptism
item.description: Today Russel Brand is getting baptized. As such the world of Protestantism has plenty to say on the matter. One such comment on the matter is below. Someone commented this on the post above: Baptism Means nothing if He has not placed his faith in the finished work of Jesus Christ and repented of his sins.

item.title: Idaho SB1291 & SB1317
item.description: The problem with this approach is that it is a double-edged sword that is being wielded by a 900 lbs gorilla. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uahVZP-tSQw&t=298s https://legislature.
